title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 379.2 - Required minimum distribution
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 379.2 - Required minimum distribution

State Regulations

Notwithstanding any other provision of law to the contrary, the Retirement System shall comply with Internal Revenue Code section
401(a)(9), including the minimum distribution incidental benefits rule of

Internal Revenue Code section 401(a)(9)(G), pursuant to a reasonable and good
faith interpretation of Internal Revenue Code section 401(a)(9) in accordance
with Treasury Regulation section 1.401(a)(9) -1. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
379.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
